articles.title: Ben Ogden ends United States' 50-year medal drought in cross-country with silver in sprint - NBC Olympics
articles.description: Ben Ogden won silver in the men's cross-country skiing sprint Tuesday at the Milan Cortina Olympics. He became just the second U.S. man to win an Olympic cross-country skiing medal and the first in 50 years.
